name: Super VR Trump-Out
description:
"My fingers are long and beautiful, as, it has been well been documented, are various other parts of my body."

While trying to air the dirty laundry of Donald Trump, you are caught red-handed by the Trumpster himself. The only way to get the truth to the good people of America, is to engage in a round of fisticuffs and serve the Prima Donald a fistful of Bern.

Using Oculus Rift and Razer Hydra-controllers.
